thread.title: Here’s Your First Look at the Upcoming Riccardo Tisci x NikeLab Air Max 97 Mid
thread.title_full: Here’s Your First Look at the Upcoming Riccardo Tisci x NikeLab Air Max 97 Mid

author: Graeme Campbell
title: Here’s Your First Look at the Upcoming Riccardo Tisci x NikeLab Air Max 97 Mid
text:
Well, we didn’t see this coming. In what could be one of the hottest sneaker releases of 2017, NikeLab continues its ongoing relationship with Riccardo Tisci on a gorgeous Air Max 97 Mid.
The shoe appeared courtesy of Instagram user @mmarvelous.soles and, similar to previous releases between the two, comes in a black colorway with rich gold hits. The upper appears to be constructed of leather, with embossed Swoosh x RT branding featuring on the upper lateral of the heel. Gold lace tips and a white air unit midsole complete the opulent look.
RT x AIR MAX.!?? COP or DROP.!? 
A post shared by MARVELOUS SOLES™ (@marvelous.soles) on Mar 3, 2017 at 10:58am PST 

Will you cop or drop? Stay tuned for further information as we have it.
Speaking of hype sneakers, here’s your best look yet at the KAWS Air Jordan 4 .
